Debates in DH Digital Project Index
Mina Rees Library / CUNY Graduate Center
About

Digital Humanities Research & Documentation

Over the course of the Spring 2022 semester, researchers in conjunction with librarians at the Mina Rees Library, will help index digital projects cited in the Debates in Digital Humanities book series, assist with preliminary data analysis and visualizations based on the resulting dataset, and document the process on this site.
